# fafreqs

The `fafreqs` R package is a compilation of widely available allele frequency databases for markers commonly used in forensic applications (mainly STRs).

## Installation

Using devtools

```{r eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("knifecake/fafreqs")
```

## Example usage

Once installed, datasets become available after loading the package

```{r eval=FALSE}
library("fafreqs")

ft_popstr_europe
```
